thread.title: Drake has some new tattoos and, well, it's best if you just see for yourself
thread.title_full: Drake has some new tattoos and, well, it's best if you just see for yourself

author: Martha Tesema
title: Drake has some new tattoos and, well, it's best if you just see for yourself
text:
Drake might have countless of chart topping songs, but if we're being honest, he doesn't have the best track record when it comes to his tattoos .
This week, the 6 god added three more inked illustrations to his body thanks to Swedish tattoo artist Niki Norberg , and don't worry, they all surpass your Drake tattoo expectations.
SEE ALSO: Drake unleashed a passionate rant against Trump during a London tour stop
The first is not too surprising, considering Drake has expressed that he is a fan of Sade . In loving tribute of the singer, he got her portrait inked on his ribcage.
ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ "with love Sade' X" @champagnepapi #bishoprotary #nocturnalink #inkeeze #radiantcolorsink #morelife #drake #sorryforblurrypic
A post shared by ArtğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ TattooğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼LaserğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ (@niki23gtr) on Mar 22, 2017 at 9:26am PDT
The next one is a little more unexpected.
While at the tattoo parlor, the OVO mogul got none other than the fragrance your favorite MCM used in the '80sâ€”Drakkar Noir. This is not fake news. He really does now have a little Drakkar Noir bottle, slightly tilted, sitting on his shoulder.
ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ "More Life" ğŸŒ¸ğŸ @champagnepapi #bishoprotary #nocturnalink #inkeeze #radiantcolorsink #morelife #drakkar #noir #drake #hasselbladx1d
A post shared by ArtğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ TattooğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼LaserğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ (@niki23gtr) on Mar 20, 2017 at 9:19am PDT
Drake's Twitter handle back in the day was @drakkardnoir, so this throwback makes at least a little bit of sense.
On top of all that, Drizzy celebrated the release of his playlist More Life by tattooing the pink flower (ğŸŒº ) that's been tied with the project through his social media presence.
ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡¦ "More Life" ğŸŒ¸ğŸ@champagnepapi #bishoprotary #nocturnalink #inkeeze #radiantcolorsink #morelife
A post shared by ArtğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ TattooğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼LaserğŸ‘ˆğŸ¼ (@niki23gtr) on Mar 18, 2017 at 3:38am PDT
You keep doing you, Drake. More life, more tattoos.
